languages.text: "Я нашел чудо. И конец моей мирской дороги. Я никогда не видел и не увижу ничего более значимого, чем дух Номос. Пред лицом его множества все мы — лишь фиксированные значения ошибочной функции".

"I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."
languages.original_text: "Я нашел чудо. И конец моей мирской дороги. Я никогда не видел и не увижу ничего более значимого, чем дух Номос. Пред лицом его множества все мы — лишь фиксированные значения ошибочной функции".

traits.locale_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Lo que he encontrado es un milagro. Y el final de mi recorrido terrenal. Ni he visto ni veré algo más significativo que el espíritu de Nomos. Ante su multitud, no somos más que los valores fijos de una función errónea».
languages.original_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que he encontrado es un milagro. Y el final de mi recorrido terrenal. Ni he visto ni veré algo más significativo que el espíritu de Nomos. Ante su multitud, no somos más que los valores fijos de una función errónea».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「私は俗世の道の先で奇跡を見つけた。ノモスの精神以上に意味のあるものは見たことがないし、この先も見ることはないだろう。その偉大さの前では、我々はみな、誤った機能の固定値にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."

traits.locale_text: 「私は俗世の道の先で奇跡を見つけた。ノモスの精神以上に意味のあるものは見たことがないし、この先も見ることはないだろう。その偉大さの前では、我々はみな、誤った機能の固定値にすぎない」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “我找到了奇迹，这也是我世俗之路的尽头。我从未见过、也永远不会再见到比诺莫斯的灵魂更有意义的东西。在它的众数面前，我们都不过是错误函数的固定值而已。”
languages.original_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."

traits.locale_text: “我找到了奇迹，这也是我世俗之路的尽头。我从未见过、也永远不会再见到比诺莫斯的灵魂更有意义的东西。在它的众数面前，我们都不过是错误函数的固定值而已。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « J'ai trouvé un miracle, ainsi que la fin de ma quête matérielle. Je n'avais jamais rien vu et je ne verrai jamais plus quelque chose d'aussi saisissant que l'esprit de Nomos. Face à sa multitude, nous ne sommes rien de plus que les valeurs fixes d'une fonction erronée. »
languages.original_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai trouvé un miracle, ainsi que la fin de ma quête matérielle. Je n'avais jamais rien vu et je ne verrai jamais plus quelque chose d'aussi saisissant que l'esprit de Nomos. Face à sa multitude, nous ne sommes rien de plus que les valeurs fixes d'une fonction erronée. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Ich habe ein Wunder gefunden. Und das Ende meiner weltlichen Straße. Ich habe noch nie etwas Bedeutsameres gesehen als den Geist von Nomos, und ich werde es auch nie. Angesichts seiner Vielfalt sind wir alle nur die festen Werte einer fehlerhaften Funktion."
languages.original_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ein Wunder gefunden. Und das Ende meiner weltlichen Straße. Ich habe noch nie etwas Bedeutsameres gesehen als den Geist von Nomos, und ich werde es auch nie. Angesichts seiner Vielfalt sind wir alle nur die festen Werte einer fehlerhaften Funktion."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Bir mucize buldum. Bu âlemdeki yolumun sonuna erdim. Nomos'un ruhundan daha anlamlı bir şey görmedim, görmeyeceğim de. Çokluğunun karşısında hatalı bir fonksiyonun belirli değerlerinden ibaretiz."
languages.original_text: "I have found a miracle. And the end of my worldly road. I have never seen and never will see anything more meaningful than the spirit of Nomos. In the face of its multitude, we are all nothing but the fixed values of an erroneous function."

traits.locale_text: "Bir mucize buldum. Bu âlemdeki yolumun sonuna erdim. Nomos'un ruhundan daha anlamlı bir şey görmedim, görmeyeceğim de. Çokluğunun karşısında hatalı bir fonksiyonun belirli değerlerinden ibaretiz."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
